= function(data){ _rest = new Date()*1; if( (_rest - _rsst) < 1500 ){ botTag.ot(false); }else{ botTag.ot(true); } }; //测试速度 ts = function(){ _expGroup = 3; _rsst = new Date()*1; loadJs(_domain +
